Employee.title: Employee
Employee.description: Represents an employee in the canteen system.

employeeId.description: The employee's official ID number, used as the document ID.

department.description: The department the employee belongs to.

ticketBalance.description: The number of meal tickets the employee currently has.

FeedingRecord.title: FeedingRecord
FeedingRecord.description: Represents a record of an employee's meal consumption.

employeeId.description: The ID of the employee who consumed the meal.

employeeName.description: The name of the employee (denormalized for easy display).

timestamp.description: The date and time of the meal consumption, stored as a Firestore Timestamp.

Biometric.title: Biometric
Biometric.description: Stores the biometric data for an employee.

employeeId.description: The ID of the employee this biometric data belongs to. This is the document ID.

template.description: The biometric template data, usually a Base64 encoded string.

enrolledAt.description: Timestamp of when the biometric data was enrolled.

definition.description: Stores employee profiles. The document ID is the official employee number.
A log of all feeding events. Data is denormalized for efficient querying and reporting.
Stores the biometric template for each employee. The document ID is the employee's ID.
